mapper.select: select * from yeps_eventreview where evnum = #{evnum} order by eventReview_num asc
mapper.insert: insert into yeps_eventreview values (yeps_eventreview_seq.nextval, #{evnum}, #{mnum}, (select email from yeps_member where mnum = #{mnum}), #{eventReview_content}, to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{ip})
